I really think that server owners should get together and make an agreement , like for instance...

A regular on OCN gets temp banned for trolling and comes to Avicus and trolls and doesn't get banned.

Servers should united against unlawful players. May be an agreement can be made for example, if a player gets banned on lets say a server that is united with this server and comes to this server he or should get banned. It sounds harsh but unlawful players should learn that they cant just come to a server and do the same crap over and over again.

Post down below on what other things that Servers that are United can do too help.

Think of it as the UN of Minecraft or the EU of Minecraft.

replies.body:
I don't like it. If people want to play the game, then let them play it. You can't take away a persons right to have fun just because they went around causing chaos on other servers that have little to no relation to each other. It's more or less a server choice rather than what actually has to happen. If you want to ban someone who hasn't done anything on your server, go right ahead. 

Like I said, keep in mind that this is a game. We're not a server relatively based off of competition (until the tournament). It's not our affairs, therefore I think it'd be pointless to get involved.

This all being said, I can think of a few exceptions:
A) Player key loggers/account hackers. Those should be banned simply for the safety of a server.
B) Advertisers. Essentially, these aren't people who want to play the game. They want attention through taking advantage of other servers. 

Thats really all from me. I'm not discouraging us from doing this but I think it's just kind of silly.
